meanings.definition: The quality or state of being preferable.
meanings.sent1: Her preferabilities made her the top choice for the job.
meanings.sent2: The preferabilities of the new car model attracted many customers.
meanings.sent3: His preferabilities for ice cream over cake always brought a smile to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The preferabilities of kindness over rudeness shone brightly in her actions.
meanings.sent5: The preferabilities of honesty in a leader are crucial for trust.

meanings.definition: The ability to be preferred or chosen over something else.
meanings.sent1: The preferabilities of the blue dress made it stand out in the store.
meanings.sent2: Customers often consider the preferabilities of price and quality when shopping.
meanings.sent3: The cat's preferabilities for fish over meat were quite evident during meal times.
meanings.sent4: The preferabilities of hard work over luck were emphasized in the motivational speech.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the preferabilities of each option can help in decision-making.
